formula: Following Piza's definition for the Fermat coefficients: (n:c)=binomial(2n-c, c-1)/c, a(n)= Round( sum_ {c=1..n} (n:c) ). - Pab Ter (pabrlos2(AT)yahoo.com), Oct 13 2005a(n) = rounded(sum(A258993(n,k)/(2*k+1)): k = 0..n-1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 22 2015
